Factsheet

kohrabi

Regular Price:

Description

FRAGMENT is a "Speedrun" platformer, inspired by Titanfall 2, Celeste and Portal. You played as a weaponized human test subject disguised as a robot. Your test is to shoot through the test, destroying the heart behind your creation, is it?. STORY* Welcome. We are the TRANSHUMAN FOUNDATION. Founded to pioneer the next stage of human evolution through artificial intelligence and advanced robotics. Today, we unveil our most ambitious creation yet: The Rab6it. Designed for speed, resilience, and adaptability, the Rab6it is an autonomous unit capable of navigating diverse terrains, supporting frontline logistics and high-risk environments It can travel at speeds of up to 12.36 units per second, withstand explosions, survive falls from any height, and anchor itself to walls using a high-friction climbing system. The Rab6it also features a projectile propulsion system, allowing rapid traversal through difficult terrains. Warning: Standing near its blast radius may result in severe injuries to unaugmented humans. At the heart of the Rab6it lies our proprietary Artificial Intelligence, a central brain powering every unit simultaneously, capable of memorizing, processing, making hundreds of decisions per second, solving complex problems with a 99.9% accuracy rate - trained continuously through organic feedback simulation to evolve in real time as if it is a human. This isn’t just artificial intelligence anymore. This is pure intelligence. This breakthrough doesn't just redefine robotics. It accelerates the entire AI industry—by at least five decades. Creating a controlled, sustainable, predictable future. Introducing... the Rab6it.

History

Started out as a club project with blocky square graphics, it got a whole art redo because i kept jumping projects.

Features

  • 50 intense levels to complete.
  • Pixel art graphics with smooth animations.
  • Boomshakalaka.
  • You can turn off screenshake, Bloom, Distort effects in the settings.
